delegatedTodos.title: Delegated tasks
delegatedTodos.description: This is a list of tasks that have been delegated to another person. To reassign the task to yourself, select the “Assign to day” button and choose the appropriate date.

globalTodos.title: Global tasks
globalTodos.description: This is a list of tasks that have been set as distant tasks to be completed, e.g. in a year, month, etc. To assign a task to a specific date, press the “Assign to day” button and select the date.

cyclicTodos.title: Repeating tasks
cyclicTodos.description: Tasks from this list are automatically added to the daily list of tasks.

coopTodos.title: Shared tasks
coopTodos.description: Create a list, add tasks and members to achieve goals together.
coopTodos.deleteTable: Are you sure you want to delete the table?
coopTodos.deleteTableDescription: This action will delete all tasks from this table and is irreversible.

coopTodos.leaveTableDescription: This action will remove you from this table.
